summary:
The Original Desert Dust - Forget salt n pepper, you’ll bring this to the diner instead. Dust your fries, Avocado toast, Eggs, chicken and give a hand to whatever is bland.

 Savory Desert Dust - When you want to savor that postcard moment. The cumin and the chili powder will fill your kitchen with the aromas that transport you to the place you’d rather be.

 Spicy Desert Dust - Kick it up a couple of notches with the Sonoran Desert’s own chiltepin chili in this Dust blend. It does well on your grilled meats, vegetables and spicy margs.
